title: 1 Hey! Hurry up and get your Discount
description: Our store is giving 50% discount on the sale. Grab your tokens and availed that opportunity.

title: 2 Are you want to buy Winter Outfit?
description: Outfitter Brand is giving upto 25% off. Hurry Up! and buy your winter cloths.

title: 3 Congratulations to the newly promoted employee
description: The statement should make the promoted employee feel special and recognized without being overly distracting.
